mapper.insert: insert into nmpl_base_station_info ( station_id, station_name, station_type, enter_network_time, station_admain, remark, public_network_ip, public_network_port, lan_ip, lan_port, station_status, station_network_id, station_random_seed, relation_operator_id, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, is_exist ) values( #{stationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stationType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{enterNetworkTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{stationAdmain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publicNetworkIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publicNetworkPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lanIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lanPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stationStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{stationNetworkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stationRandomSeed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relationOperatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isExist,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update nmpl_base_station_info set station_name = #{stationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, station_type = #{stationType,jdbcType=CHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, public_network_ip = #{publicNetworkIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lan_ip = #{lanIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lan_port = #{lanPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, public_network_port = #{publicNetworkPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, relation_operator_id = #{relationOperatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update nmpl_base_station_info set is_exist = 0 where station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select id,station_id, station_name, station_type, remark, public_network_ip,public_network_port, lan_ip, station_network_id,lan_port, relation_operator_id, create_user from nmpl_base_station_info where station_id in
#{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select station_id,station_network_id,station_type from nmpl_base_station_info where lan_ip = #{lanIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and is_exist = 1

select station_id from nmpl_base_station_info where station_network_id like "%" #{stationNetworkId,jdbcType=CHAR} "%" union select device_id as station_id from nmpl_device_info where station_network_id like "%" #{stationNetworkId,jdbcType=CHAR} "%"

select id,station_id, station_name, station_type,station_status, nmpl_base_station_info.remark, public_network_ip,public_network_port, lan_ip,station_network_id,lan_port, relation_operator_id from nmpl_base_station_info where relation_operator_id = (select relation_operator_id from nmpl_base_station_info where station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and nmpl_base_station_info.is_exist = 1 and station_status in(1,2,3)

select id,station_id, station_name, station_type,station_status, nmpl_base_station_info.remark, public_network_ip,public_network_port, lan_ip, SUBSTRING_INDEX(station_network_id,'-',-1) as station_network_id,lan_port, relation_operator_id, company_name from nmpl_base_station_info,nmpl_company_info where nmpl_base_station_info.is_exist = 1 and nmpl_company_info.is_exist = 1 and nmpl_base_station_info.relation_operator_id = nmpl_company_info.company_id and nmpl_company_info.company_type = '02' and station_type = #{stationType,jdbcType=CHAR} order by nmpl_base_station_info.update_time desc

select station_network_id from nmpl_device_info where public_network_ip = #{publicNetworkIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or SUBSTRING_INDEX(station_network_id,'-',-1) = #{stationNetworkId,jdbcType=CHAR} or (lan_ip = #{lanIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and lan_port = #{lanPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and is_exist = 1 union select station_network_id from nmpl_device_extra_info where public_network_ip = #{publicNetworkIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or SUBSTRING_INDEX(station_network_id,'-',-1) = #{stationNetworkId,jdbcType=CHAR} or (lan_ip = #{lanIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and lan_port = #{lanPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and is_exist = 1 union select station_network_id from nmpl_base_station_info where public_network_ip = #{publicNetworkIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or SUBSTRING_INDEX(station_network_id,'-',-1) = #{stationNetworkId,jdbcType=CHAR} or (lan_ip = #{lanIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and lan_port = #{lanPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and is_exist = 1
